metadata.title: Shaggy's Jungle Tek - Full Spectrum A/B Extraction

overview.principle: Use citric acid to pull alkaloids into solution, then NaOH to freebase and break down cell walls
overview.solvents: Toluene for extraction, heptane for separation

products.full_spectrum: Orange Deemsters - contains DMT + Yuremamine + beta-carbolines
products.separated_red: Red Jungle Spice - Yuremamine + other alkaloids (heptane insoluble)

overview.yield: 10-14g from 500g stellar bark (8g considered success with average bark)

solvents.toluene: Ace Hardware 'Toluol' in paint thinner section (or xylene substitute)

chemicals.sodium_hydroxide: Roebic crystal drain opener (Lowe's plumbing section)

equipment: Pyrex dishes (average and large surface area)

step_1_acid_extraction.preparation: Dissolve 30g citric acid in 1 gallon distilled water in crockpot
step_1_acid_extraction.cook: Crockpot on high, boil 6-8 hours, stir regularly
step_1_acid_extraction.cool: Remove lid, let steam and cool (reduces volume, needs cooling)

step_2_basification.caution: Solution gets very hot very quickly - avoid skin/eye contact
step_2_basification.add_to_jug: Pour NaOH solution into bottom of gallon wine jug first
step_2_basification.add_soup: Ladle soup (bark and all) into jug through funnel
step_2_basification.volume: Fill to base of neck, leaving neck empty - add water if needed

step_3_np_extraction.add_toluene: Fill empty neck with toluene (1/4 inch from mouth)
step_3_np_extraction.mix: Cap jug, gently invert 10 minutes - mix without creating foam
step_3_np_extraction.separate: Set upright, let layers separate (minutes to hours)
step_3_np_extraction.collect: Siphon toluene layer with pipettes into mason jar
step_3_np_extraction.critical: DO NOT suck up dark bottom layer - toxic
step_3_np_extraction.repeat: At least 4 pulls until toluene comes up lighter colored
step_3_np_extraction.settling: Let toluene sit 1 hour before proceeding - particles settle

step_4_evaporation.safety: Toluene flammable - well ventilated area, avoid ignition sources
step_4_evaporation.method_outdoor: Pour into large pyrex pan, fan blowing, evaporate outside
step_4_evaporation.method_indoor: Pyrex on hotplate at 200°F with fan on surface
step_4_evaporation.smell_test: Should smell of DMT only, not solvent - crank to 300°F if needed
step_4_evaporation.technique: Blow on oil while cooking to move around and evap all solvent
step_4_evaporation.solidify: Cool under fan, scrape with razor until hardened

step_5_acetone_wash.setup: Near-boiling water bath in small pot
step_5_acetone_wash.process: Fill test tube halfway with extract, rest with acetone
step_5_acetone_wash.stopper: Use stopper with hole to prevent pressure buildup
step_5_acetone_wash.dissolve: Dip in water bath until acetone bubbles, shake, settle
step_5_acetone_wash.collect: Siphon acetone with no solids onto hot pyrex dish (200°F)
step_5_acetone_wash.repeat: Until all extract dissolved - insoluble material stays in tube
step_5_acetone_wash.evap: Acetone evaps quickly but gets cold - keep heated to avoid moisture

step_6_separation_optional.critical: NO TOLUENE allowed - use clean equipment only
step_6_separation_optional.heat_heptane: Small mason jar in crockpot on high, no water, lid on
step_6_separation_optional.melt_extract: Test tube with extract in crockpot until melted
step_6_separation_optional.wash: Fill tube with hot heptane, forcefully mix layers with pipette
step_6_separation_optional.separate: Keep hot - white DMT falls back into red if cooled
step_6_separation_optional.collect: Quickly siphon heptane layer onto large pyrex dish
step_6_separation_optional.red_product: Oil in tube = Red Jungle Spice

orange_deemsters.experience: Longer duration than pure white, more defined OEVs
orange_deemsters.philosophy: Keeps spirit of mimosa intact - all alkaloids present

red_jungle_spice.note: Remains in test tube after heptane separation

troubleshooting.wont_solidify: Scrape around with razor, move oil, fan dry, repeat

comparison_to_other_teks.vs_lazyman: More complex but yields full spectrum with yuremamine
comparison_to_other_teks.vs_limtek: Uses NaOH instead of lime - not safe for veggie oil
comparison_to_other_teks.unique_feature: Can separate white DMT from red jungle spice

harm_reduction_notes.legal_status: DMT is Schedule I in most jurisdictions
harm_reduction_notes.purpose: Historical documentation of harm reduction research
